data.message:
I hear you saying there is "not enough recycled plastic to go beyond that in Great Britain at the moment"
There isn't enough Oil in the UK to manufacture new plastic. But by some amazing miracle, it manages to appear at the right moment.
Source it. You're Coca Cola, I'm sure you can figure something out.

I will not be buying your products until you bolster a recycling deposit scheme, or go full recycled plastic.
